Summary Note:
Lea Anna Jost and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Copenhagen. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
With a career spanning nearly 11 years, Lea Anna Jost has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Lea Anna Jost is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Lea obtained her secondary school diploma from Kantonsschule Sursee Luzern in 2008.
Lea completed her university studies at Suffolk University in Geneva in 2014.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 11 years, Lea Anna Jost has established herself as a key player in the industry.
At JP/Politikens Hus A/S, Lea Anna Jost held the position of Journalist from 2014 to 2017, developing essential skills in the field.
Her subsequent role was as a Editor at DR (Danish Broadcasting Corporation), where she continued to grow professionally from 2019 till now.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 140000 DKK from her earnings at all companies.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 8930000 DKK.

She inherited 9970000 DKK from her grandfather, a well-known Oil and Gas Executive, in 2018, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting her in achieving her financial goals.
